entities.description: The number of offender records for each ORI-incident number.
An identifier for a specific incident in the database.
The raw count of responses for each offender record category.
The percentage representation of each offender record category based on the total.
Statistical summary including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.

relationships.description: Provides a summary of statistical measures for the dataset.
Indicates the number of offender records associated with a specific ORI-incident number.
Shows the raw count of each N offender record category.
Shows the percentage of each N offender record category.
